room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: Had an Amazing Time! Did the Presidential Bunker with a group of friends and had a great, thought provoking time. We actually did bet it with 7 mins to spare! Can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: We had a great time! Our group was paired up with 3 teenage ladies who didn’t seem to mind that they got hooked up with us 40-55 year olds... our combined skills got us out of the Bunker in 55:33 minutes... Justin was an excellent “secret service agent in charge”. We will definitely recommend the experience to friends and come again!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: Love this location! Have done all three rooms and have to say that each and everyone is so unique! I recommend the Presidents Bunker which is by far my favorite! It’s so cool. Absolutely adored Justin and Joe they were so friendly and extremely helpful. Come to this escape room you won’t regret it!!😊😊😊😊
